description: The Copernicus Global Land Service (CGLS) delivers a global Land Cover product at 100-meter spatial resolution (CGLS-LC100) on an annual basis from 2015-2019. Each pixel value corresponds to a different type (class) of physical coverage of the Earth's surface
title: Land Use Land Cover
citation: Buchhorn, M. ; Lesiv, M. ; Tsendbazar, N. - E. ; Herold, M. ; Bertels, L. ; Smets, B. Copernicus Global Land Cover Layers — Collection 2. Remote Sensing 2020, 12, Volume 108, 1044. DOI 10.3390/rs12061044. Accessed through Resource Watch, (26 April 2022). www.resourcewatch.org.
